Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the "Trooper Lawrence P. Gleason Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates the bridge on the portion of Charley Hill Road which crosses interstate route 87 in the town of Schroon, county of Essex as the "Trooper Lawrence P. Gleason Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Trooper Lawrence P. Gleason Memorial Bridge"
